statements: SELECT * FROM habitats WHERE region = 'North America';
SELECT habitat_name, area FROM habitats WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest' ORDER BY area DESC;
SELECT habitat_name, area FROM habitats WHERE habitat_type = 'Jungle' ORDER BY habitat_name ASC;
SELECT SUM(area) AS total_area FROM habitats;
SELECT habitat_name, region FROM habitats WHERE region = 'Australia' ORDER BY habitat_name ASC;
SELECT habitat_name, region FROM habitats;
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_type, area FROM habitats WHERE area > 1000;
SELECT * FROM habitats WHERE region = 'North America';
SELECT habitat_id, habitat_name FROM habitats ORDER BY habitat_name ASC;
SELECT AVG(area) AS avg_area, MAX(area) AS max_area, MIN(area) AS min_area FROM habitats;
SELECT * FROM WildlifeHabitats;
SELECT habitat_id, habitat_name FROM WildlifeHabitats ORDER BY habitat_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM WildlifeHabitats WHERE habitat_location.STY = 'POINT(0 0)';
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_location FROM WildlifeHabitats WHERE habitat_name LIKE '%forest%';
SELECT habitat_source_id, habitat_destination_id, connectivity_score FROM EcosystemConnectivity WHERE connectivity_score > 90;
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_location FROM WildlifeHabitats;
SELECT habitat_id, habitat_name, habitat_location FROM WildlifeHabitats WHERE habitat_id = 1;
SELECT habitat_id, habitat_name, ST_AsText(habitat_location) AS location FROM WildlifeHabitats ORDER BY habitat_name DESC;
SELECT habitat_source_id, habitat_destination_id, connectivity_score FROM EcosystemConnectivity WHERE connectivity_score > 0.5 ORDER BY connectivity_score DESC;
SELECT habitat_source_id, habitat_destination_id, AVG(connectivity_score) AS avg_score FROM EcosystemConnectivity GROUP BY habitat_source_id, habitat_destination_id;
SELECT * FROM Wildlife_Habitats;
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_location FROM Wildlife_Habitats;
SELECT habitat_name, connectivity_id FROM Wildlife_Habitats JOIN Connectivity ON Wildlife_Habitats.habitat_id = Connectivity.habitat_id;

SELECT habitat_name, ecosystem_name, connection_strength FROM Wildlife_Habitats JOIN Connectivity ON Wildlife_Habitats.habitat_id = Connectivity.habitat_id JOIN Ecosystems ON Connectivity.ecosystem_id = Ecosystems.ecosystem_id;
SELECT * FROM Connectivity WHERE connection_strength > 0.5;
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_location FROM Wildlife_Habitats;
SELECT ecosystem_name, ecosystem_type FROM Ecosystems WHERE ecosystem_type = 'Tropical';

SELECT habitat_name, ecosystem_name, connection_strength FROM Wildlife_Habitats JOIN Connectivity ON Wildlife_Habitats.habitat_id = Connectivity.habitat_id JOIN Ecosystems ON Connectivity.ecosystem_id = Ecosystems.ecosystem_id;

SELECT habitat_name, ecosystem_name, connection_strength FROM Wildlife_Habitats JOIN Connectivity ON Wildlife_Habitats.habitat_id = Connectivity.habitat_id JOIN Ecosystems ON Connectivity.ecosystem_id = Ecosystems.ecosystem_id WHERE Connectivity.connection_strength > 0.8;

SELECT habitat_name, habitat_location, ecosystem_name, ecosystem_type FROM Wildlife_Habitats JOIN Connectivity ON Wildlife_Habitats.habitat_id = Connectivity.habitat_id JOIN Ecosystems ON Connectivity.ecosystem_id = Ecosystems.ecosystem_id WHERE habitat_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM habitats;
SELECT id, name FROM ecosystems ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT wildlife.name, habitats.name FROM wildlife JOIN habitats ON wildlife.habitat_id = habitats.id;
SELECT id, name, region FROM ecosystems WHERE region = 'Pacific';
SELECT id, wildlife.name, ecosystems.name AS ecosystem_name FROM connectivity JOIN wildlife ON connectivity.wildlife_id = wildlife.id JOIN ecosystems ON connectivity.ecosystem_id = ecosystems.id;
SELECT * FROM habitats WHERE area > 1000 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT ecosystems.name, wildlife.name FROM ecosystems JOIN connectivity ON ecosystems.id = connectivity.ecosystem_id JOIN wildlife ON wildlife.id = connectivity.wildlife_id;

SELECT ecosystems.region, COUNT(wildlife.id) AS wildlife_count FROM ecosystems LEFT JOIN connectivity ON ecosystems.id = connectivity.ecosystem_id LEFT JOIN wildlife ON wildlife.id = connectivity.wildlife_id GROUP BY ecosystems.region;

SELECT habitats.name, ecosystems.region, wildlife.name FROM habitats LEFT JOIN wildlife ON habitats.id = wildlife.habitat_id LEFT JOIN connectivity ON wildlife.id = connectivity.wildlife_id LEFT JOIN ecosystems ON connectivity.ecosystem_id = ecosystems.id WHERE habitats.area < 500;

SELECT DISTINCT ecosystems.region, COUNT(wildlife.id) AS wildlife_count FROM ecosystems LEFT JOIN connectivity ON ecosystems.id = connectivity.ecosystem_id LEFT JOIN wildlife ON wildlife.id = connectivity.wildlife_id GROUP BY ecosystems.region HAVING COUNT(wildlife.id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM habitats;
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_type FROM habitats ORDER BY habitat_type DESC;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM species JOIN population ON species.species_id = population.species_id WHERE population_size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM ecosystems WHERE ecosystem_type LIKE '%forest%';
SELECT species_name, habitats.habitat_name FROM species JOIN habitats ON species.species_habitat_id = habitats.habitat_id ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM species WHERE species_type = 'Mammal';
SELECT species_name, species_type FROM species WHERE species_type = 'Bird' ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT habitat_name FROM habitats WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest';
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM species JOIN population ON species.species_id = population.species_id WHERE population_size > 1000;
SELECT habitat_name, COUNT(*) AS species_count FROM habitats JOIN species ON habitats.habitat_id = species.species_habitat_id GROUP BY habitat_name HAVING species_count > 2;
